name: VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3! Game Composers of the World UNITE
blurb: The 3rd album from the award-winning multimedia symphonic/rock decade long world touring video game concert event... Video Games Live!

rewards.reward: No Reward

INSERT COIN
=============================
Name to appear as a donor in VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 DVD/Blu-Ray credits and digital CD credits, PLUS for helping us out you'll receive an exclusive bonus Kickstarter 15 track video game music compilation digital album download entitled VIDEO GAMES LIVE - BONUS ROUND! NOT SOLD IN STORES OR ONLINE! ONLY AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH KICKSTARTER! This additional collectors album includes music from VGL creator and game composer Tommy Tallarico, VGL conductor (and Grammy Award winner) Christopher Tin (Civilization IV), VGL guest conductor (and Grammy nominated) Austin Wintory (Journey), VGL guest conductor Eimear Noone, Balder's Gate II composer Craig Garfinkle, VGL performer Frank Klepacki (Command & Conquer), VGL vocalist Jillian Aversa (Halo, God of War), Andrew "zircon" Aversa (Soul Calibur V, Street Fighter II HD), a special OCRemix FF VI "Terra's Theme" AND MORE! This album collection is NOT VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3, it is simply a bonus compilation gift for being a part of our project.  Immortalize friends names with this gift and buy multiples!

[$25 value!]

PRESS START
==============================
$5 tier PLUS a digital copy of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 album.

[$40 value!]

CHOOSE YOUR PLAYER
=============================
$10 tier PLUS a digital download of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album, PLUS a digital copy of original artwork of Earthworm Jim playing a guitar created exclusively for Tommy Tallarico (composer of Earthworm Jim) from EWJ creator Doug TenNaple. 

[$80 value!]

STAGE 1-3 ==============================\r\n(STAGE 1-2 SOLD OUT! So we have decided to offer the same tier again but with no limit quantities as it was the most requested tier) $20 tier PLUS an exclusive digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 album containing special tracks not available on the CD (and never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS an exclusive Kickstarter special collectors edition VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album digital download (includes tracks not available on the original album release), PLUS a digital download of a new Austin Wintory Piano Arrangement album made specifically for this project based on the Grammy nominated Journey soundtrack, PLUS a digital Hi-Res download of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show. [$125 value!]

STAGE 1-2\r\n============================== \r\n(STAGE 1-1 sold out Day 1!  This tier is similar except we substitute the LEVEL 2 HD video download with the LEVEL 2 album download) - $20 tier PLUS an exclusive digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 album containing special tracks not available on the CD (and never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS an exclusive Kickstarter special collectors edition VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album digital download (includes tracks not available on the original album release), PLUS a digital download of a new Austin Wintory Piano Arrangement album made specifically for this project based on the Grammy nominated Journey soundtrack, PLUS a digital Hi-Res download of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show. [$125 value!]

STAGE 1-1
==============================
(Duck Hunt Early Bird SPECIAL! This limited price point is only available for the first backers of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 project) - $20 tier PLUS an exclusive HD digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 full length feature video (never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS an exclusive Kickstarter special collectors edition VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album digital download (includes tracks not available on the original album release), PLUS a digital download of a new Austin Wintory Piano Arrangement album made specifically for this project based on the Grammy nominated Journey soundtrack, PLUS a digital Hi-Res download of  the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show. 

[$125 value!]

SMART BOMB
=============================
Missed out on the limited $25 tier sale? No worries! It’s still available for $35 and we’ll even throw in the newly remixed & remastered COMPLETE fully downloaded rare and limited Earthworm Jim Anthology album which includes 28 digitally recorded and mastered songs with live instruments and uniquely arranged remixes. NOT SOLD IN STORES! ONLY AVAILABLE THROUGH KICKSTARTER!, PLUS a beautiful & rare Hi-Res Video Games Live in China, digital Blizzard show poster, PLUS a rare hand drawn digital download of a Video Games Live in Taiwan poster. 

[$175 value!]

WARP ZONE
==============================
(Special Rate! This limited price point is only available for the first backers of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 project) - $35 tier PLUS a physical CD product of VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3, PLUS 2 VGL temporary tattoos, PLUS a exclusive personally limited Tommy Tallarico Video Games Live guitar pick. 

[$200 value!]

WARP ZONE 2 ============================== \r\n(Same Rewards as WARP ZONE!) - $35 tier PLUS a physical CD product of VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3, PLUS 2 VGL temporary tattoos, PLUS a exclusive personally limited Tommy Tallarico Video Games Live guitar pick. [$200 value!]

EXTRA LIFE
==============================
(Special Rate! This limited price point is only available for the first backers of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 project) - $40 tier PLUS the CD will be signed by at least 7 video game composers whose work appears on the album!  PLUS a complete digital download of the award winning Tommy Tallarico Greatest Hits Vol. II album containing 29 digitally recorded songs from 12 games including Earthworm Jim 1 & 2, Treasures of the Deep, Spot Goes to Hollywood, Madden Football, Skeleton Warriors AND MORE! NOT SOLD IN STORES OR ONLINE! ONLY AVAILABLE THROUGH THIS PROJECT!, PLUS an exclusive digital download of the piano sheet music used in VGL from the fan favorite mega-hit “Cohen’s Masterpiece” by Garry Schyman, also known as "Scherzo No. 7 - Andante con Fuoco" from the game BioShock - NOT SOLD IN STORES OR ONLINE!, PLUS a digital download of the full VGL conductors score from our Classic Arcade Medley containing over 25 Arcade Classics in chronological order!  

[$300 value!]

EXTRA EXTRA LIFE\r\n==============================\r\nThe $50 EXTRA LIFE Price Point is now completely SOLD OUT, but we're able to do the same exact Rewards at $60. We think there are going to be a LOT of sore composer hands from signing so many CD's! - For this tier you'll receive the $40 tier PLUS the CD will be signed by at least 7 video game composers whose work appears on the album! PLUS a complete digital download of the award winning Tommy Tallarico Greatest Hits Vol. II album containing 29 digitally recorded songs from 12 games including Earthworm Jim 1 & 2, Treasures of the Deep, Spot Goes to Hollywood, Madden Football, Skeleton Warriors AND MORE! NOT SOLD IN STORES OR ONLINE! ONLY AVAILABLE THROUGH THIS PROJECT!, PLUS an exclusive digital download of the piano sheet music used in VGL from the fan favorite mega-hit \u201cCohen\u2019s Masterpiece\u201d by Garry Schyman, also known as "Scherzo No. 7 - Andante con Fuoco" from the game BioShock - NOT SOLD IN STORES OR ONLINE!, PLUS a digital download of the full VGL conductors score from our Classic Arcade Medley containing over 25 Arcade Classics in chronological order! [$300 value!]

ALL DIGITAL - MUSIC & ART
=============================
You asked for it... and here it is!  ALL album & art rewards for this entire project in digital download format! OVER 18 HOURS OF CONTENT! Albums include...  
VIDEO GAMES LIVE - BONUS ROUND!, PLUS VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE (Special Extended Collectors Edition), PLUS VIDEO GAMES LIVE - LEVEL 2 (Special Extended Collectors Edition), PLUS VIDEO GAMES LIVE - LEVEL 3, PLUS Journey Piano Arrangement Album, PLUS Earthworm Jim Anthology, PLUS
Tommy Tallarico - Greatest Hits Volume One, PLUS Tommy Tallarico - Greatest Hits Volume II, PLUS MDK Soundtrack, PLUS Frank Klepacki - Conquering 20 Years, PLUS an exclusive HD digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 full length feature video (never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS digital versions of Tron Light Cycle blueprint, Earthworm Jim original art, VGL World Tour poster, VGL China Blizzard poster and VGL Taiwan poster PLUS name to appear as a donor in VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 DVD/Blu-Ray credits and digital CD credits.
[$300 value!!]

CHALLENGE STAGE
==============================
$50 tier PLUS an exclusive special collectors edition digital download of the award winning VIDEO GAMES LIVE - LEVEL 2 album containing additional live mixes and content from the SOLD OUT Video Games Live .mp3 player, PLUS the first page of the Video Games Live conductors scores from World of Warcraft, StarCraft & Diablo printed on High Quality Thick Presentation Paper and SIGNED by the Blizzard composers!, PLUS a Video Games Live Official Souvenir Program, PLUS a complete digital download of the full Video Games Live conductors score from Chrono Trigger & Chrono Cross!, PLUS an EXCLUSIVE Hi-Res PRINT OUT on High Quality Thick Presentation Paper of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show. 

[$500 value!]

LEVEL UP!
==============================
$100 tier PLUS digital downloads of the complete VGL conductors scores from Kingdom Hearts, Advent Rising & Earthworm Jim, PLUS a Video Games Live keychain, PLUS a Video Games Live winter hat, PLUS a Video Games Live signed poster, PLUS a High Quality Thick Presentation Paper print out of original artwork of Earthworm Jim playing a guitar created exclusively for Tommy Tallarico (composer of Earthworm Jim) from EWJ creator Doug TenNaple SIGNED by Tommy, PLUS an exclusive and rare, out-of-print digital download of the MDK Soundtrack album NEVER BEFORE RELEASED IN DIGITAL FORM! EXCLUSIVE TO KICKSTARTER ONLY!

[$750 value!]

ALL DIGITAL - MAESTRO ============================= All the music and artwork from this project ($75 Tier), PLUS the following full digital conductors scores from "CLASSIC ARCADE MEDLEY", "CHRONO TRIGGER & CHRONO CROSS", "EARTHWORM JIM", "ADVENT RISING", "KINGDOM HEARTS", "HALO TRILOGY" & "WORLD OF WARCRAFT (MONTAGE)", PLUS an exclusive digital download of the piano sheet music used in VGL from the fan favorite mega-hit \u201cCohen\u2019s Masterpiece\u201d by Garry Schyman, also known as "Scherzo No. 7 - Andante con Fuoco" from the game BioShock!  [$1000 value!]

BONUS ROUND
==============================
(Special Limited Tier! Once these are gone, they are gone FOREVER! This limited tier is only available for 100 people!) - $150 tier PLUS 2 Ultimate Gamer V.I.P. Backstage Experience Packages which consist of the following: Video Games Live backstage laminated tour pass, Pre-show production tour, Q&A and special personal meet & greet  with Video Games Live creator and game composer Tommy Tallarico, Free download card for the special extended Video Games Live: Level 2 album, Official vintage Video Games Live poster, Video Games Live Temporary Tattoos, Special FRONT OF LINE access to the Video Games Live post-show meet & greet, Signed composers scores and sheet music from the performance (V.I.P. Packages to be given in person at the show of your choice and does NOT include show tickets, travel, airfare, transportation, accommodations, etc., you pick the show and get yourself there, we supply the experience), PLUS a High Quality Thick Presentation Paper print out of original artwork of Earthworm Jim playing a guitar created exclusively for Tommy Tallarico (composer of Earthworm Jim) from EWJ creator Doug TenNaple SIGNED by Tommy AND Doug!, PLUS an incredible never before offered Kickstarter exclusive Frank Klepacki (Command & Conquer composer) 5-CD autographed package of the following albums NOT SOLD IN STORES!: Viratia, Awakening Of Aggression, Virtual Control, Rocktronic and Morphscape, PLUS a complete digital download of the Video Games Live conductors scores from the Command & Conquer “Hell March” segment and End of Nations (both composed by Frank Klepacki), PLUS your name (or the name of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a $250 BONUS ROUND donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a $250 BONUS ROUND donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years! 

[$1200 value!]

BONUS ROUND 2 ============================== \r\n(Bonus Round SOLD OUT and we've been getting a lot of requests to bring this back so we added the 3 hour Skype session and are calling it BONUS ROUND 2) - $150 tier PLUS 2 Ultimate Gamer V.I.P. Backstage Experience Packages which consist of the following: Video Games Live backstage laminated tour pass, Pre-show production tour, Q&A and special personal meet & greet with Video Games Live creator and game composer Tommy Tallarico, Free download card for the special extended Video Games Live: Level 2 album, Official vintage Video Games Live poster, Video Games Live Temporary Tattoos, Special FRONT OF LINE access to the Video Games Live post-show meet & greet, Signed composers scores and sheet music from the performance (V.I.P. Packages to be given in person at the show of your choice and does NOT include show tickets, travel, airfare, transportation, accommodations, etc., you pick the show and get yourself there, we supply the experience), PLUS a 3 Hour Interactive Online Group Q&A and hang-out session with Tommy Tallarico and at least 4 other well known video game composers from Video Games Live to be brought to you over a secured Video Games Live Twitch.TV stream!, PLUS a High Quality Thick Presentation Paper print out of original artwork of Earthworm Jim playing a guitar created exclusively for Tommy Tallarico (composer of Earthworm Jim) from EWJ creator Doug TenNaple SIGNED by Tommy AND Doug!, PLUS an incredible never before offered Kickstarter exclusive Frank Klepacki (Command & Conquer composer) 5-CD autographed package of the following albums NOT SOLD IN STORES!: Viratia, Awakening Of Aggression, Virtual Control, Rocktronic and Morphscape, PLUS a complete digital download of the Video Games Live conductors scores from the Command & Conquer \u201cHell March\u201d segment and End of Nations (both composed by Frank Klepacki), PLUS your name (or the name of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a BONUS ROUND donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a BONUS ROUND donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years! [$1500 value!]

HYPERSPACE
==============================
$150 tier PLUS a 3 Hour Interactive Online Group Q&A and hang-out session with Tommy Tallarico and at least 4 other well known video game composers from Video Games Live to be brought to you over a secured Video Games Live Twitch.TV stream!, PLUS VGL favorite Matthew Mercer (voice of Leon Kennedy from Resident Evil 6 and other great video game characters) to record up to 30 seconds of personalized dialogue as Leon Kennedy!, PLUS a High Quality Thick Presentation Paper print out of original artwork of Earthworm Jim playing a guitar created exclusively for Tommy Tallarico (composer of Earthworm Jim) from EWJ creator Doug TenNaple SIGNED by Tommy AND Doug!, PLUS an incredible never before offered Kickstarter exclusive Frank Klepacki (Command & Conquer composer) 5-CD autographed package of the following albums NOT SOLD IN STORES!: Viratia, Awakening Of Aggression, Virtual Control, Rocktronic and Morphscape, PLUS a complete digital download of the Video Games Live conductors scores from the Command & Conquer “Hell March” segment and End of Nations (both composed by Frank Klepacki), PLUS a printed 1st page of the piano sheet music from the fan favorite mega-hit “Cohen’s Masterpiece” SIGNED by BioShock composer Garry Schyman, also known as "Scherzo No. 7 - Andante con Fuoco" from the game BioShock, PLUS your name (or the name of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a $500 HYPERSPACE donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a $500 HYPERSPACE donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years! 

[$2,000 value!]

YOU ARE LEET!
==============================
(Special Opportunity & Rate! This EXTREMELY limited price point is ONLY available for the first backers of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 project, once these are gone additional reward packages may be made available for $1,500) - $500 tier PLUS the COMPLETE heavy duty presentation style printed Video Games Live conductors scores from Chrono Trigger & Chrono Cross, the Tetris Opera AND Castlevania signed by Tommy Tallarico, PLUS signed first page conductor scores from Halo and Destiny (Marty O’Donnell & Mike Salvatori), Monkey Island (Michael Land, Peter McConnell, Clint Bajakian), World of Warcraft, StarCraft II and Diablo III (Russell Brower, Jason Hayes, Glenn Stafford, Derek Duke), Silent Hill (Akira Yamaoka), Castlevania (Kinuyo Yamishita), Metal Gear Solid 3 “Snake Eater” (Norihiko Hibino), God of War (Gerard Marino), Journey (Austin Wintory), BioShock (Garry Schyman), Earthworm Jim & Advent Rising (Tommy Tallarico), Civilization IV (Christopher Tin), DOTA 2 (Tim Larkin, Jason Hayes), Resident Evil 5 (Wataru Hokoyama), Command & Conquer (Frank Klepacki), Uncharted 2 (Greg Edmonson), Crysis 2 (Inon Zur), Assassin’s Creed II (Jesper Kyd), EverQuest II (Laura Karpman) and our Classic Arcade Medley signed by Atari founder Nolan Bushnell, PLUS a 2 hour exclusive Twitch.TV interactive video conference Q&A and hang-out session with no less than 10 of the game composers listed above, PLUS a special Video Games Live exclusive version of a Piano Arrangement sheet music book SIGNED by the Grammy Nominated Journey composer Austin Wintory, PLUS your name and picture (or the name and picture of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a special LEET! donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a LEET! donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years!, PLUS your name to appear in the physical CD booklet as a SPECIAL THANKS credit. 

[$5,000 value!]

ALL DIGITAL - LEGENDARY ============================= All of the digital music and artwork from this project ($75 Tier), PLUS 7 full Conductors Scores in digital format ($200 Tier), PLUS David Hayter (original voice of Solid Snake from Metal Gear Solid) to record up to 30 seconds of personalized dialogue as the original Solid Snake!, PLUS Matthew Mercer (voice of Leon Kennedy from Resident Evil 6 and other great video game characters) to record up to 30 seconds of personalized dialogue as Leon Kennedy!, PLUS a 3 Hour Interactive Online Group Q&A and hang-out session with Tommy Tallarico and at least 4 other well known video game composers from Video Games Live to be brought to you over a secured Video Games Live Twitch.TV stream!, PLUS a 2 hour exclusive Twitch.TV interactive video conference Q&A and hang-out session with no less than 10 of the game composers who contribute to Video Games Live, PLUS a personal one on one phone or Skype call with video game composer and Video Games Live creator Tommy Tallarico, PLUS your name and picture (or the name and picture of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a special LEGENDARY donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a LEGENDARY donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years!, PLUS your name to appear in the physical CD booklet as a SPECIAL THANKS credit.   [$6,000 value!]

FINAL BOSS
==============================
Very Rare and Very Limited!  Once these are gone, they are gone FOREVER! - $1,337 tier PLUS David Hayter (original voice of Solid Snake from Metal Gear Solid) to record up to 30 seconds of personalized dialogue as the original Solid Snake!, PLUS signed Koji Kondo (Mario & Zelda composer) Video Games Live poster (signed at the VGL Tokyo Game Show performance), PLUS an EXCLUSIVE Artist Proof Individually Numbered Hi-Res print out on High Quality thick Presentation Paper of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show SIGNED by Tron creator and executive producer Steven Lisberger and Tron Visual Effects Supervisor Richard Taylor!, PLUS a rare and extremely limited individually numbered Video Games Live in China, Blizzard show poster signed by the Blizzard Entertainment Audio Team NOT AVAILABLE ANYWHERE EXCEPT HERE!, PLUS an exclusive personally limited Tommy Tallarico Video Games Live guitar pick actually used in a Video Games Live performance!, PLUS you help to create our setlist! You get to choose a song to be played in a Video Games Live show in your area!, PLUS you will be invited to come on stage during a performance of your choice and be introduced to the audience as a major supporter of our show and this project, PLUS we will get the thousands of people in the audience to CHANT YOUR NAME so you'll have the most amazing ring tone, voice-mail or start-up sound EVER!, PLUS a personal one on one phone or Skype call with video game composer and Video Games Live creator Tommy Tallarico, PLUS your name,  picture and one-line quote (or the name and picture of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a $2,500 BIG BOSS donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a $2,500 BIG BOSS donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years!

[$10,000 value!]

MISSION COMPLETE!
==============================
Note: All of the “in-person” items below take place in Orange County, CA with most of them being within a few days of each other (travel, airfare, transportation, and accommodations are NOT included) - $1,337 tier PLUS lunch at Blizzard Entertainment w/Blizzard composers, PLUS a tour of Blizzard Entertainment!, PLUS an invitation to a highly exclusive annual video game industry BBQ at Tommy’s house where you’ll meet hundreds of game industry professionals, PLUS a tour of Tommy Tallarico Studios by Tommy, PLUS a Golden Ticket Red Carpet invitation to the WORLD PREMIERE 1st ever screening of the film and music taking place at the Kaleidoscope Edwards Cinema, PLUS an Exclusive Invitation to the Special Release Gaming Party Celebration at Howie’s Game Shack (biggest LAN Center in the U.S.!) with at least 100 famous video game composers/designers from around the world!, PLUS free inclusion into our Release Party Laser Tag Tournament at Lazer Quest! How many famous Game Composers/Designers/Artists/Programmers/Producers can you shoot?!? (or team up with!) Bring your camera!, PLUS David Hayter (original voice of Solid Snake from Metal Gear Solid) to record up to 30 seconds of personalized dialogue as the original Solid Snake!, PLUS an EXCLUSIVE Artist Proof Individually Numbered Hi-Res print out on High Quality Thick Presentation Paper of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show SIGNED by Tron creator and executive producer Steven Lisberger and Tron Visual Effects Supervisor Richard Taylor!, PLUS a rare and extremely limited individually numbered Video Games Live in China, Blizzard show poster signed by the Blizzard Entertainment Audio Team NOT AVAILABLE ANYWHERE EXCEPT HERE!, PLUS an exclusive personally limited Tommy Tallarico Video Games Live guitar pick actually used in a Video Games Live performance!, PLUS a stunning beautiful full-sized official framed Gold Record of the album customized with YOUR NAME commemorating you as a member the project, PLUS you help to create our setlist! You get to choose a song to be played in a Video Games Live show in your area!, PLUS you will be invited to come on stage during a performance of your choice and be introduced to the audience as a major supporter of our show and this project, PLUS we will get the thousands of people in the audience to CHANT YOUR NAME so you'll have the most amazing ring tone, voice-mail or start-up sound EVER!, PLUS a personal one on one phone or Skype call with video game composer and Video Games Live creator Tommy Tallarico, PLUS your name, picture and one-line quote (or the name and picture of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a $5,000 ULTIMATE GAMER donor, PLUS your name to appear on screen as a $5,000 ULTIMATE GAMER donor before every Video Games Live performance over the next 2 years!  

[$20,000 value!]

HIGH SCORE!
==============================
$5,000 tier PLUS help to create a new Video Games Live segment! Sit down with the VGL team and game composers/producers/designers and help to pick and arrange the music, edit the video, produce the light show. Personally work with game publishers and game developers in creating your segment, PLUS you will also be asked to join us on stage to help introduce the segment during the WORLD PREMIERE of the piece (or during another show of your choosing, does not include travel, airfare, transportation, accommodations, etc.), PLUS a stunning beautiful full-sized official framed Platinum Record of the album customized with YOUR NAME commemorating you as a member the project, PLUS your name, picture and paragraph bio (or the name,  picture, bio of your choosing) to be enshrined on our website and Facebook page as a $10,000 HIGH SCORE donor, NOTE: We are open to customizing your experience/rewards at this level so if you have any special requests or ideas... just let us know and we'll try to accommodate! 

[$50,000 value!]
